elements.name: I want to add a new trip

steps.name: I make a authorized POST request to :trips
success equals true in a result

elements.name: I want to update a trip

steps.name: I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is /0/_id from a result
I make a authorized PATCH request to :trips/[trip_id]/name
success equals true in a result

elements.name: I want to get trip details

steps.name: I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is /0/_id from a result
I make a authorized GET request to :trips/[trip_id]

elements.name: I want to add transport to the trip

steps.name: I define that departure_city is "Hong Kong"
I define that arrival_city is "Chiang Mai"
I make a GET request to :cities/[departure_city]
I define that departure_city_id is 0/_id from a result
I make a GET request to :cities/[arrival_city]
I define that arrival_city_id is 0/_id from a result
I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is 0/_id from a result
I make a authorized PATCH request to :trips/[trip_id]/transport
success equals true in a result

elements.name: I want to update transport of a trip

steps.name: I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is 0/_id from a result
I make a authorized PATCH request to :trips/[trip_id]/transport/0
success equals true in a result

elements.name: I want to remove transport from a trip

steps.name: I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is 0/_id from a result
I make a authorized DELETE request to :trips/[trip_id]/transport/0
success equals true in a result
I define that city is "Kuala Lumpur"
I make a GET request to :cities/[city]
I define that city_id is 0/_id from a result
I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is 0/_id from a result
I make a authorized PATCH request to :trips/[trip_id]/lodging
text: "address": "Lorong 1/77a, Imbi, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia",

steps.name: success equals true in a result

elements.name: I want to remove a trip

steps.name: I make a authorized GET request to :trips
I define that trip_id is /0/_id from a result
I make a authorized DELETE request to :trips/[trip_id]
success equals true in a result
